description: One of our previous boys gave me a call and offered to bring his friend with him. They both needed money badly and were willing to do almost anything to get it. I didn´t think twice and agreed. I could always call it off if the guy was not good enough. Well, his friend was a cute blond 18 years old boy. No way I would ever turn down such an awesome opportunity. I explained them everything over a cup of coffee and they accepted my terms. I wanted them to reach their limits and I think I manage to do that. Watching those two friends playing with each other was very exciting. And telling them what to do was even better. Fortunately, they were so greedy that they did everything I asked them to do.
title: Czech Hunter 341
